Package fs.fibu2.data.format

Interface Summary
FormatValidator A class implementing this interface can validate if a string conforms to a certain format, such as a date format.
JournalExport A JournalExport is a class which can export an fsfibu 2 Journal to a file in a certain format, e.g.
 

Class Summary
CurrencyFormatValidator Checks, whether a string is a valid currency ISO code.
DefaultAccountComparator Compares two Account objects via their name, using DefaultStringComparator.
DefaultCurrencyFormat Provides a creation method for a NumberFormat, which formats numbers to two fraction digits with a locale-specific separator and a given currency symbol.
DefaultFloatComparator Compares two Floats according to their size.
DefaultStringComparator Compares to strings according to their lexicographical ordering.
EntryComparator An EntryComparator induces (more or less) an ordering of fsfibu2 journal entries
EntryDateComparator Compares two GregorianCalendar objects - but only the day, month, year fields.
Fsfibu1Converter This class provides static methods for converting an fsfibu1 xml document to an fsfibu2 journal and vice versa.
Fsfibu2DateFormats This class summarizes some static strings specifying date format patterns.
GivenFormatValidator A GivenFormatValidator validates a string against a given format
JournalExportLoader This class provides access to JournalExports via their ID.
